General.Name: Pulse Oil Corp
General.Description: Pulse Oil Corp. engages in the exploration and production of oil and natural gas projects in Alberta. It owns 100% interests in the Bigoray assets covering approximately 3,909 net acres of land in the Bigoray area of Alberta; and the Queenstown assets covering approximately 4,781 net acres of land in the Queenstown area of Alberta. The company was formerly known as Wolfpack Capital Corp. and changed its name to Pulse Oil Corp. in December 2016. Pulse Oil Corp. was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 666 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3P6
